EmailTemplate.name: Drip - Avaloq - August 15.Email 2 - Test Data Management for Avaloq
EmailTemplate.subject: Test Data Management for Avaloq
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Testing your Avaloq Banking Suite should be easy.Read our Test Data Management white paper here! http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/test-data-management-whitepaper/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=drip
Manual testers within the banking sector generally spend up to 70% of their time preparing and provisioning data for tests.
No longer.
Tricentis has developed a Tosca Testsuite extension specifically to address the biggest challenges of testing your Avaloq system:
Test Data Management Risk Coverage Test Automation
Click here to learn about Tricentis’ solution for test data issues in Avaloq testing, and how it can impact your business today. http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/test-data-management-whitepaper/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=drip
Best regards, The Tricentis Team
